page.title: 05THORNBURY FESTIVALS / SPRING
page.content:
{THORNBURY MOP} This is a big fete held in Castle St every year in April. The Mop has lots of different stalls and entertainments such as bands and dancing. Some people dress up as maids from the old times.
Kate Robins (Aged ll yrs)
{THORNBURY ARTS FESTIVAL} The Thornbury Arts Festival is a mixture of concerts, plays, demonstrations and displays of arts and crafts held in the public buildings of Thornbury for 2 weeks in April. Well known people are invited to attend and the organisers try to include items which will suit all tastes and ages.
Maria Fletcher (Aged ll yrs)
